title: 帮帮忙啊，打不开，内存8113
author: Mc-世界
txt_content:
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x0000000790000000, 167772160, 0) failed; error='页面文件太小，无法完成操作。' (DOS error/errno=1455)

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 因为8113MB远超出你的系统当前设置情况下的承受能力了。把内存下调至2048MB或者4096MB试试。

replies.author: Mc-世界
replies.txt_content: 解决了，谢谢，下整合包，他贴子说要内存5000+
